name: macOS Use
description: Control macOS applications via accessibility APIs - click, type, press keys, and traverse UI elements

tools.name: open_application_and_traverse
tools.description: Opens or activates a specified application and then traverses its accessibility tree.

tools.name: click_and_traverse
tools.description: Simulates a mouse click at specific coordinates within the window of the target application and then traverses its accessibility tree.

tools.name: type_and_traverse
tools.description: Simulates typing text into the target application and then traverses its accessibility tree.

tools.name: press_key_and_traverse
tools.description: Simulates pressing a specific keyboard key with optional modifier keys, then traverses the accessibility tree.

tools.name: refresh_traversal
tools.description: Only performs the accessibility tree traversal for the specified application. Useful for getting the current UI state without performing an action.
